_header: With heart repentant of my great offence
_description: Charles d’Orléans, an epistle to his mistress — six stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar682.First Lines:
WIth hert repentaunt of my gret offenceI me recomaunde in eche
                    humbil wise…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…And wille yow wele wher ye me wil or noAnd fare yow well thus
                    ende y now as loo
